sentences.english: On the credentials tab specify the account name and password.
sentences.chinese: 在选项卡上指定的凭据的帐户名和密码。

sentences.english: Employees of the bank can manage customers and their corresponding accounts.
sentences.chinese: 银行的员工可以管理客户及其对应的帐户。

sentences.english: Of course, username and password-based accounts have to be managed as well.
sentences.chinese: 当然，基于用户名和密码的帐户也必须进行管理。

sentences.english: That is roughly what will be deducted automatically from your account over the year.
sentences.chinese: 这大致就是每年自动从你帐户中扣除的金额。

sentences.english: A monthly report on an individuals account activity at the bank they have an account(s) with.
sentences.chinese: 银行为开户个人提供其帐户活动情况的月报表。

sentences.english: This is the pre-transaction snapshot of this account.
sentences.chinese: 这是这个帐户在交易之前的快照。

sentences.english: Please ensure that all the account holder(s) or authorized signatories sign this exchange form.
sentences.chinese: 请帐户持有人或法人代表于此处签名。

sentences.english: Each account can be set up independently rates.
sentences.chinese: 每个帐户可独立设置费率标准。

sentences.english: To create a new user account, you need administrator privileges.
sentences.chinese: 要创建一个新的用户帐户，您需要有管理员特权。

sentences.english: All deliveries MUST include client name and Schwab account number.
sentences.chinese: 所有交收必须包括客户姓名及嘉信理财帐户号码。

sentences.english: Changes the basic account the general account, might save transfers and takes present.
sentences.chinese: 将一般帐户改为基本帐户，可以存转并取现了。

sentences.english: Changes the basic account the general account, might save transfers and takes present.
sentences.chinese: 将一般帐户改为基本帐户，可以存转并取现了。

sentences.english: How can we set up an account with you?
sentences.chinese: 若何才能跟你们设立记帐户头呢？

sentences.english: For security purposes, your checking account number must be re-entered.
sentences.chinese: 为安全起见，确认帐户号码时必须重新输入。

sentences.english: Are you the ultimate beneficial owner(s) in relation to the Account?
sentences.chinese: 你是否此帐户的最终实益拥有人？

sentences.english: Setup email Accounts and Address Books.
sentences.chinese: 设置电子邮件帐户和“通讯簿”。

definition: to transfer (money to a bank account)
to deposit (e.g. in a bank account)
to withdraw money/to take money out of the bank
online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]
